units.name: Page
units.special: Spotter - Friendly units within a range of 4 have their effective range increased by 1.

units.name: Archer
units.special: Double tap - On successful hit, archer may make extra attack for 1 damage against another unit in range.

units.name: Footman
units.special: Sword & Board - If the footman doesn’t move this turn, the first point of damage he takes on the next turn is negated.

units.name: Knight
units.special: Trusty Steed - If the knight doesn’t attack this round, it has +1 to its move attribute.

units.name: Trebuchet
units.special: All She’s Got - The trebuchet’s shot this round is at +1 range, but this piece cannot move or attack next turn.

units.name: King Arcturus
units.special: For the King! - Once per turn, King Arcturus can target a friendly unit within 4 squares and grant it an additional MOVE action equal to its base MOVE value. If this unit engages in melee combat during this turn, it gains a +2 ATK bonus for its first attack.

units.name: Lady Elise, Master Tactician
units.special: Strategic Savant - Once per turn, Lady Elise can grant an additional attack action to a friendly unit within 4 squares. If that unit successfully defeats an enemy unit with this action, it may immediately move up to its MOVE value.

units.name: Sir Gideon, Captain of the Guard
units.special: Vigilance - Once per turn, in place of his move and attack, Sir Gideon projects an aura of vigilance in a 2-square radius around him. All friendly units within this aura gain 'First Strike' for their next turn. 'First Strike' allows a unit to counterattack with a range of 1 the first time it is attacked during the enemy's turn, dealing its regular attack damage to the attacking enemy unit to a max of 3.

factions.name: Fae Armies of the Forest Lords

units.name: Satyr
units.special: Lure - In place of attack, the satyr lures his opponent with a magical flute. Opponents within 5 squares move two squares towards the satyr.

units.name: Wild Elf
units.special: Mobile Strike - In place of attack ranger may attack and move two extra tiles afterwards.

units.name: Fairy Swarm
units.special: Flying: The fairy may fly over water but may not end their turn here. The Fairy swarm may move into any terrain type for only 1 move point.

units.name: Centaur
units.special: Trample: Once per turn in place of move, a centaur may travel up to its move value through an enemy unit, doing full attack damage. Turn must end on an open tile.

units.name: Forest Lord
units.special: Grab: In place of attack, the forest lord may grab an enemy 2 tiles away and pull them into melee range via the shortest path, causing 2 damage.

units.name: Elara, Queen of the Wilds
units.special: Nature's Command - Once per turn, in place of her attack, Elara can give a friendly unit within 4 squares an additional move or attack action. If that unit is on a Forest terrain, it gains +1 ATK during this action.

units.name: Thalion, Ancient Treant Sage
units.special: Roots of the Forest - Once per turn, in place of an attack, Thalion can immobilize an enemy unit within 4 squares by entangling it with roots. The affected unit cannot move or attack during their next turn.

units.name: Narae, Enchantress of the Glade
units.special: Forest's Embrace - Once per turn, in place of an attack, Narae can heal a friendly unit within 4 squares for 4 HP. If the target is on a Forest terrain, they gain an additional 2 HP.

units.name: Woodland Ranger
units.special: Shadowstep - In place of attack, the Woodland Scout may move an additional 3 squares, ignoring terrain movement costs.

units.name: Elven Archer
units.special: Volley - In place of attack, the Elven Archer may target up to 3 enemy units within range, dealing 1 damage to each.

units.name: Elven Swordsman
units.special: Elusive Strike - After successfully attacking an enemy unit, the Elven Swordsman may move up to 2 squares.

units.name: Elven Guardian
units.special: Sentinel - In place of move, the Elven Guardian gains +2 to its effective attack range this turn.

units.name: Elven Mage
units.special: Elemental Bolt - In place of attack, the Elven Mage may target an enemy unit within range, dealing 4 damage and applying an elemental effect based on the target's terrain type.

units.name: Aerendil, High Prince of Eldanor
units.special: Tactical Brilliance - Once per turn, Aerendil may swap the positions of two friendly units within 6 squares. If either unit is an Elven Archer or Elven Mage, they gain +1 ATK during their next attack.

units.name: Liriel, Priestess of the Moon
units.special: Lunar Blessing - Once per turn, Liriel can target a friendly unit within 4 squares and grant it a shield that absorbs up to 3 damage for one turn. If the target is an Elven Guardian, they also gain +1 MOVE this turn.

units.name: Galdor, Master of Elements
units.special: Elemental Mastery - Once per turn, in place of his attack, Galdor can target a friendly Elven Mage within 6 squares and grant it the ability to choose the elemental effect of its Elemental Bolt regardless of the target's terrain type.

factions.name: Orc, Goblin, Ogre, and Troll Hordes

units.name: Goblin Scout
units.special: Slippery - The Goblin Scout may move through enemy-occupied squares.

units.name: Orc Archer
units.special: Volley - In place of attack, the Orc Archer may target all enemy units within a 2-square radius of a chosen square within range, dealing 2 damage to each.

units.name: Ogre Brute
units.special: Smash - In place of attack, the Ogre Brute may deal 2 damage to all adjacent enemy units.

units.name: Troll Crusher
units.special: Regeneration - The Troll Crusher regains 2 HP at the start of each turn.

units.name: Goblin Sapper
units.special: Sabotage - In place of attack, the Goblin Sapper may target a square within range, dealing 3 damage to all enemy units within a 2-square radius and destroying any structures in the affected area.

units.name: Gorak, Orc Warlord
units.special: Warcry - Once per turn, Gorak can grant all friendly units within 3 squares +1 ATK and +1 effective range for one turn.

units.name: Gribnash, Goblin Shaman
units.special: Unstable Hex - Once per turn, in place of his attack, Gribnash can cast a random hex on an enemy unit within range, applying one of the following effects: slow (unit's MOVE is halved next turn), weaken (unit's ATK is reduced by 2 next turn), or disorient (unit moves in a random direction 1 square next turn, if possible).

units.name: Krug, Ogre Chieftain
units.special: Earthshaker - Once per turn, in place of his attack, Krug can slam the ground, dealing 3 damage to all enemy units within 2 squares and reducing their MOVE by 1 next turn.
